string.name: about_info
string.P: We are called geeks and red-eyed, ordinary people think that we live in server rooms or in our mothers basement, eat one doshik and wash ourselves with liquid to clean the monitors (in fact, this is not entirely true).
We are engaged only in original and interesting projects, no matter how complex and long they are, as we are always looking for a way to show our creativity = D.
Our offices are located in 3 cities 4 of which:
-Bikini Bottom restaurant "Krusty Krabs", on the kitchen stove
